name: SpAliendeR
description:
[ N E W S ]

I uploaded a new version v0.7.10 for both WIN.exe and HTML5.

I corrected some minor bugs, particularly the background music that stopped for some reason when a new game istarted.

SpAliendeR is a retro space shooter inspired by the famous classic Space Invaders. This is the second game I created in order to learn how to code.

Get SpAliender for your mobile or tablet on GooglePlay!

Here are a few tips:

- Two game modes are available: Quick and Infinite.

- Shoot the buttons in order to start a new game in the mode you chose.

- Ingame, shooting an UFO will make a capsule appears. Shoot it and it will drop a powerup.

- There are 4 powerups: +1 Life, Shield, Rockets and Barrier Repair.

- There are also a few more surprises...
